column2: Confident Commander
This person has been seen to be confident in commanding troops.
Good Commander
This person has been proven to be a good commander.
Superior Commander
This person has become a superior commander in comparison of their commanders.
Great Commander
This person has been hailed as one of the greatest of commanders.
Legendary Commander
This person is truly the greatest of all commanders. Legends and internet forums shall weave great tales of this person!
Indifferent Commander
This person seems a little indifferent when commanding troops.
Incompetent Commander
This person struggles to commander troops well.
Poor Commander
This person has become famous for their poor commanding skills, troops are wary of this person.
Pathetic Commander
This person can't command a bunch of school children if they could have tried! Troops flee at the thought of this person leading them.
Confident Attacker
This person has been seen to be confident in attacking.
Good Attacker
This person has been proven to be a good attacker
Superior Attacker
This person has become a superior attacker.
Great Attacker
People are hailing this person as one of the greatest attackers in the world.
Heroic Attacker
This person has become famous for the heroic attacking ability this person possessed in battle.
Indifferent Attacker
This person seems to be a little indifferent while attacking.
Incompetent Attacker
This person is incompetent at attacking.
Poor Attacking
This person have become famous for poor attacking ability in battle.
Pathetic Attacker
This person can't even make a pack a wolves attack prey without losing!
Confident in Defence
This person is confident in defence.
Good Defender
This person have proven to be at defence.
Superior Defender
This person has become a superior defender.
Great Defender
People are hailing this person as one of the greatest defender of all time.
Heroic Defender
Tales will be written about this person thanks to the sheer defence abilities this person commands.
Indifferent Defender
This person seems a little indifferent while defending.
Incompetent Defender
This person is incompetent at defending.
Poor Defender
This person have become famous for the poor defending abilities in battles.
Pathetic Defender
This person can't even defend a rock pool without failing!
Social Drinker
This person likes to drink during feasts and around other people.
Likes A Drink
This person have been seen drinking a bit more than necessary during feasts and around other people.
Drunken Lout
This person have been seen drinking a lot more than necessary during feasts and around other people.
Sot
This person have been seen drinking all the time while spending most of the time slurring and staggering around.
Paralytic
This person drinks so much, walking is impossible and spends all of the time in bed, drunk.
Sober
This person have been seen refusing drinks at feasts and around other people.
Abstemious
This person have been seen drinking little if any drinks at feasts and around other people.
Teetotal
This person have never drank a single drop of drinks at feasts and around other people.
Uses Strong Language
This person likes to use swear words at times.
Foul Mouthed
This person uses swear words more than most people.
Swears Like A Trooper
This person uses more swear words thank ordinary words while talking.
Irredeemably Foul Mouthed
The only thing uttered by this person is swear words.
Minion
This person likes to work for another person of any desire.
Casual Adulterer
This person have been committing adultery in a casual manner.
Blatant Adulterer
This person cares little of such things called spouse loyalty.
Womaniser
Women Beware! This man like to lay with ladies and none shall stop him!
Good Ambusher
This person is good at Ambushing the enemy.
Sneaky Ambusher
This person is surprisingly good at Ambushing the enemy.
Exceptional Ambusher
This person is legendary for the great Ambushing this person have done.
Poor Ambusher
This person tries but fails to ambush the enemy most of the time.
Rotten Ambusher
This person is well known for the awful ambushing attempts against the enemy.
Pathetic Ambusher
This person better at playing Peek-a-Boo than ambushing the enemy.
Obsessional Trainer
This person likes to train the troops like a wolf around sheep..
Drillmaster
This person tends to be harsh towards the troops. But it works?
Martinet
Whips and canes are a common troop fear around this person.
Poor Disciplinarian
This person would let the troops do what they want to insure loyalty.
Too Considerate
This person tends to let troops get away with mistakes far too often.
Kills with Kindness
This person cannot order the troops without saying please and thank yous.
Gate Breaker
This person is skilled at breaking into forts.
Wall Breaker
This person is quite skilled in breaking walls apart with the siege weapons.
Into the Breach!
This person is well known for impregnating the impregnable.
Legendary Siege Expert
This person is legendary for the power to enter seemly impossible forts. This person may even enter Troy without any sweat!
Dislikes Attacking Walls
This person is known for the lack of besieging prowess.
Useless Besieger
This person is known for the shocking lack of besieging prowess.
Pathetic Besieger
This person will never take a single sandcastle let along a fortress!
Gate Keeper
This person is well known for the stalwart defence of the land
Strong as Stone
This person is like a walking fortress, few can break the fortress defence with this person in charge.
None Shall Pass!
This person is famous for the defending the indefensible.
Legendary City Defender
This person may have been a reincarnation of the defenders of Troy!
Cowers Behind Walls
This person feels excessively safe under siege.
Pathetic Defender of Cities
This person cannot defend the Fortress no matter what.
Liability in Defence
This person is better off opening the gates than to defend.

column1: # BRAVE GOOD (FAMOUSLY_COURAGEOUS AND ABOVE NEEDS BRAVE)

column2: Untouched by Fear
This person have been noticed for the lack of fear they have.
Famously Courageous
This person have become famous for the sheer courage they have.
Utterly Fearless
This person makes statues seem cowardly.
Insanely Brave
This person is considered insane due to the total lack of fear, even the gods are seen as cowards compared to this person.
Doubtful Courage
This person have their courage questioned by their fellows.
Morbidly Fearful
This person have been seen running away from spiders.
Ruled by Fear
This person hides in the closet for fear of everything.
Rather Lazy
This person tends to be lazy at times.
Lazy
This person tends to be lazy.
Indolent
This person tends to spend more time doing nothing and having servents do things for them.
Indolent Lardy Arse
This person spends more time and effort making sure that they would never have to lift a finger.
Lively
This person have been seen doing exercise.
Very Lively
This person have been seen doing labour for entertainment.
Energetic
This person seems to keep going when most other people would tire.
Blessed with Vitality
This person keeps going and going and going...
Axe Biter
This person when Berserk to bite axes to hold the sheer rage within.
Shield Biter
This person when Berserk to bite shields to hold the sheer rage within.
Distrusts Foreigners
This person sees Foreigners as distrustful.
Hates Foreigners
This person hates any Foreigners that they do not personally know.
Loathes Foreigners
This person speaks loudly against any Foreigners, friend or other.
Welcoming to Foreigners
This person is seen allowing Foreigners to rest in their homes.
Likes Foreigners
This person sees Foreigners as future friends
Fascinated by Foreigners
This person finds Foreigners and their foreign ways as worthy causes to study.
Faithless
This person have recently lost faith with the gods.
Atheist
This person have made their lost faith public.
Despises the Gods
This person feel that the Gods have abandoned them.
Hates the Gods
This person loudly speaks against the Gods, much to the horror and anger of others.
Devout
This person follows the Gods publicly.
Religious
This person follows the Gods more than most people.
Honours the Gods
This person Honours the Gods to an almost unhealthy degree.
Venerates the gods
This person spends their enitre waking life in prayer and other stuff that the Gods may have commanded them to do.
War Chief
This person have conquered a County making them a War Chief.
Mighty War Chief
This person have conquered a Duchy making them a Mighty War Chief.
Warlord
This person have conquered a Kingdom, people now declare this person as a Warlord!
Legendary Warlord
This person shall be recorded as a Legendary Warlord for having conquered a entire Empire!
Bureaucrat
This person have been noted for good Bureaucratic skills.
Skilled Bureaucrat
This person have been noted for very good Bureaucratic skills.
Superb Bureaucrat
This person have been noted for Superb Bureaucratic skills.
Jobs-worth
This person have been noted for sticking to the rules far too much.
Administratively Inept
This person have been noted for the poor Bureaucratic skills.
Stunningly Incompetent
This person is unable to run a wine stand let alone a nation!
Outstanding Speaker
This person is well known for the great speeches they make.
Famous Orator
This person is famous for the their speeches.
Great Orator
This person is recorded as one of the Greats. Homer may have a new rival!
Tedious Speaker
This person tends to drone on while making their speeches.
Boring Speaker
This person is famous for the sheer boring nature of speech.
Boring Beyond Belief
This person is a dread of all parties as merely uttering puts people off.
Boring Little Tit
This person is so boring, if this person dictates a Comedy, it shall be used for funerals!
Fluent Speaker
This person is well known for the fluent nature of their debates.
Skilled Debater
This person can win debates without problems.
Rhetorical Expert
This person can out debate an entire senate without a sweat.
Fond of Poetry
This person likes Poetry and spends time reading them.
Epic Poet
This person have become world famous for the sheer mastery of Poetry.
Understanding of Strategy
This person understands the basics of Strategy.
Strategic Expert
This person is able to do Strategic command better than others.
Strategist
This person is a qualified Strategist. Tends to see the bigger picture better than most.
Understanding of Tactics
This person understands the basics of Tactics.
Tactical Expert
This person is able to do Tactical command better than others.
Tactician
This person is a qualified Tactician. Tends to see the smaller picture better than most.
Understanding of Mathematics
This person understands the basics of Mathematics.
Mathematics Expert
This person is able to do Mathematics better than others.
Mathematician
This person is a qualified Mathematician. Tends to see the Mathematics behind the economy better than most.
Understanding of Natural Philosophy
This person understands the basics of Natural Philosophy.
Expert on Natural Philosophy
This person is able to do Natural Philosophy better than others.
Natural Philosopher
This person is a qualified Tactician. Tends to see the Natural Philosophy behind politics better than most.
Political Animal
This person likes to get involved with Politics time to time. Is showing signs of improvement.
Politician
This person have dedicated themselves in Politics.
Consummate Politician
This person is a expert in Politics and all the pitfalls within it.
Understanding of Logistics
This person understands the basics of Logistics.
Logistics Expert
This person is able to do Logistics better than others.
Logistician
This person is a qualified Logistician. Tends to see the Logistics behind the Military supply better than most.
Philosophically Inclined
This person is spending time thinking of the meaning of life.
Philosopher
This person spends most of the time thinking of the higher purpose of humanity.
Abstruse Philosopher
This person spends all the time thinking of a reason why a birds can fly.
Agitator
This person can encourage people to do things through words.
Tub Thumper
This person make crowds listen to their cause.
Rabble Rouser
This person can sway a large crowd to doing what somebody wants them to do.
Demagogue
This person can sway an entire nation to follow somebody wishes.
Aspiring Architect
This person is a Aspiring Architect.So far this person knows how to make things cheaper but not faster.
Architect
This person is an Architect that will make buildings cheaper and faster.
Great Architect
This person is world famous. The Great Architect may have built wonders or built an impressive building.
Vanquisher
This Roman have been known as a Vanquisher of foes.
Great Vanquisher
This Roman is a Great Vanquisher of foes, the people love this Roman.
Conqueror
This Roman is a Conqueror of nations. This Roman Came,Saw and Conquered.
Victor
This Person have been Victorious in wars lately.
Famous Victor
This person have become famous for the recent Victory.
Conquering Hero
This person have become legendary for conquering a nation. This person shall be remembered as a hero!
Gourmet of Life
This person likes the pleasures of Life.
Refined Tastes
This person revels in expensive.
Rarefied Tastes
This person demands nothing more than the rarest and the most expensive of life.
Restrained
This person tend to act in a calm manner.
Cold Manner
This person haven't been showing much emotions, making them seem cold-hearted.
Stoic
This person dedicated to the pursuit of all things knowledgeable and have renounced all emotions.
Stern
This person doesn't enjoy being flashy.
Spartan
This person is either grown up in a Spartan environment or this person have very few items of wealth.
Austere
This person avoids anything that they may consider "wealthy". They tend to give more money away than they earn.
Self Enforced Poverty
This person have given all that they own to spend the rest of their life in Poverty. Presumably to be considered holy if not messianic.
Lover of Beauty
This person enjoys looking at beautiful things such as art or music.
Connoisseur
This person is well versed in the fine arts world.
Aesthete
This person surrounds themselves of pure beauty and judge everything in terms of Aesthetics. No ugliness is allowed!
Gourmand
This person likes to eat many rare things.
Apician Glutton
This person gorge themselves on highly expensive food just for the sake of it.
Ignorant
This person is Ignorant of the world around them.
Very Ignorant
This person is very Ignorant of the world around them.
Wilfully Ignorant
This person is Ignorant of the world around them and proud of it. Some consider these people an embarrassment.
Likes a Flutter
This person likes to spend a few coins on games of chance.
Gambler
This person likes to gamble most of their money for the thrill.
Inveterate Gambler
This person is addicted to gambling and now spends time trying to get more money by any means.
Ruled by Luck
This person is so obsessed with gambling that the now make their decisions by flipping a two headed coin.
Self Publicist
This person have made a book that speaks fondly of them.
Spin Doctor
This person tends to make themselves or someone else look far better than they should be.
Narcissist
This person considers themselves as perfect in every way and will tell everyone around them.
Clean Hands
People tend to die around this person but no one can really prove who done it.
Killer from Necessity
Death tends to follow whenever this person visits, is this person cursed? or something else is going on?
Master of Assassins
This person have been found out as a master of some assassins. That explains the strange deaths!
Counter Spy
This person knows how to prevent spies from doing their jobs.
Counter Espionage
This person knows how to break spy rings, decode messages and other things spies use.
Spy Catcher
This person have managed to catch spies, this is quite dangerous for any spies to stay.
Survivor
This person have survived assassinations. Was it sheer luck?
Expert Survivor
This person have survived many attempts making it far harder for plotters to get a dagger in them.
Immune to Death?
Despite any attempts and various things to kill this person, they refuse to die. Is the gods protecting them?
Sneaky
This person have been well known for sneaking past the guards at night.
Spy
This person is a spy willing to do someone dirty work.
Superior Spy
This person is a Superior spy willing to do someone dirty work.
Expert Spy
This person is a Expert spy willing to do someone dirty work.
Master Spy
This person is a Master spy willing to do someone dirty work.
Poor Spy
This person is trying but failing to be a spy.
Inferior Spy
This person can't seem to spy as well as others.
Useless Spy
Perhaps this person should look for a different job.
Cut Throat
This person have a disturbing fascination to taking someone life.
Murderer
This person have killed in cold blood.
Assassin
This person have a started to obtain a name for themselves for killing others.
Expert Assassin
This person is an expert in killing others, those who name is on the list, beware!
Master Assassin
This person have never seen failure when their strike their targets. Flee if you must!
Inept Poisoner
This person have failed to kill someone, thankfully it might have been a mistake?
Poor Murderer
This person tried to kill someone but so far nothing. Maybe their not cut out for the job?
Useless Assassin
This person needs to start looking for a different job before they get caught again.
Careless
This person is rather careless, misplacing items and forgetting minor problems.
Careless of Security
This person feels so safe that they forget to bring their bodyguards with them. This might come back to haunt them.
Trusting Fool
This person either doesn't understand or care that people might what them dead.
Watchful
This person tends to keep a close eye around them.
Security Conscious
This person know what someone is out to get them and tend to have a bodyguard next to them at all times.
Obsessed by Security
This person surrounds themselves with bodyguards,even in bath and bed.
No Enemies
This person thinks that everyone loves them.
Ingenuous
This person sees people without hate or malice towards them.
Scant Trust
This person doesn't like to trust others.
Suspicious
This person suspects others more than most.
A Bit Paranoid
This person thinks people are out to get them. Maybe they are right but...
Tactful
This person knows what to say without causing offence.
Courteous
This person knows what to do and say without causing offence to others. A little bow goes a long way.
Diplomatic
This person can hold their tongue if offence is suspected.
Polished Diplomat
This person can say hurtful things to someone and still make it like honey.
Expert Diplomat
This person can stop entire wars with their tongue.
Tactless
This person have a habit of saying what on their mind, even if it cause offence.
Discourteous
This person cares little for common courteous behaviour, a little bow is shameful to their eyes.
Undiplomatic
This person will offend many if they can.Honey like words is for weaklings.
Untruthful
This person is known for the lack of trustfulness of their words..
Economical with the Truth
This person have been caught out lying to others but still lies to avoid trouble.
Liar
This person cannot speak many truths without others suspecting falsehood. Don't hire this person for shepherding!
Pathological Liar
No matter how hard this person tries, lies spew out of their mouth. Even in death lies will come out.

column1: #RICH BAD (STARTS GETTING THESES TRAITS WHEN RICH 1K+ GOLD)

column2: Financially Irregular
This person seem to earn more gold than than normal..
Fiscally Flexible
This person is strongly suspect to skimming a few coins of the treasury.
Embezzler
This person have been caught red handed and now only fools shall give them a job involving coins.

column1: #DECEIVER (LIKE LIAR BUT BOTH LEADS TO IT)

column2: Sly
This person have a strange habit of avoiding trouble with their silver tongue.
Trusty
This person can be trusted with your coins.
Upright
This person can be trusted with your own life if it must come to that.
Flexible
This person considers laws to be bendable.
Dubious
This person have appointed friends and family to high places. Is this person corrupt?
Corrupt
This person have been outed as Corrupt, the peasants are angry, might want to remove them before anything "bad" happens to them.
Strict
This person tends to be strict around others. Shortcomings is not tolerated.
Authoritarian
This person have punished others for shortcoming or even supposed lack of discipline.
Whipper and Caner
This person have been seen whipping children for petty errors.

column1: #AUTHORITARIAN GOVERNER (OTHER PEOPLE LOVE THESE TRAITS EXPECT PEASANTS)

column2: Strict Governor
This person sees lawbreakers dimly and tend to punish peasants for minor crimes..
Harsh Governor
This person does not care for such petty things called "morals" when punishment is metered out towards the peasants.
Authoritarian Governor
This person acts more like a tyrant than a governor. Even Draco will cry out in outrage for the harsh nature of the they rule.
Considerate Governor
This person feels that the peasants should be looked after. Lawbreakers are given mercy if they so desire.
Benevolent Governor
This person punish lawbreakers but is also fair to the peasants.
Liberal Governor
This person would allow anyone or anything to happen if it means the peasants are happy. Many peasants enjoy their freedom.

column1: #DISLOYAL (WILL BE LESS WILLING TO FIGHT FOR LEIGE)

column2: Apparent Loyalty
This person seems to loyal but few evidence show that they are truly loyal.
Doubtful Loyalties
Others suspect that this person is not really loyal to their liege but no one can prove it...Yet.
Disloyal
This person have shown their true colours, turncoat or otherwise this person betrayed their liege.
Blatantly Disloyal
This person care little for loyalty, if they can get ahead then they shall shops yours off first.
Publicly Loyal
This person boast more than most of their loyalty to their liege but few evidence show that they are truely loyal.
Proven Loyalties
This person have proven their loyalties in act of valour or battle.
Loyal
This person is loyal and will not betray you or their liege.
Fanatically Loyal
This person will never betray someone even if they betray them.
Plausible Talker
This person have talked their way out of sticky problems for some time.
Slick Talker
This person can sell or convince to do something without them knowing that they been duped.
Smooth Talker
Men or women beware! This person will make you do things without you even suspecting a thing!
Subject to Rumours
This women have been suspected of adultery, thankfully for her no-one have talked to the husband first..
Cuckold
This man have been found without a loyal wife and many snicker behind him for his lack of control.
Outraged Husband
This women have been caught by their husband while having a affair, many feel that she will learn from this.
Grower
This person enjoys growing things in the gardens and have dreams of owning a farm.
Farmer
This person currently owns farms and is enjoying it.
Agriculturalist
This person have many farms and is enjoying the success and wealth that the farms bring.
Poor Farmer
This person have tried but failed to produce a good harvest.
Dislikes Farming
This person have given up on the farm and now hires other farmers to work on the farm.
Loathes Farmers
This person hates the farmers that live on the farms as they are more successful. They take that rage towards other farmers in the land as well.
Miner
This person worked in the mines before working for the state.
Superior Miner
This person is quite skilled in the mines, bringing those skills to improve the land.
Expert Miner
This person was a expert in the mines before leaving and now uses that knowledge to great effect across the lands.
Indifferent Miner
This person either tried to succeed or struggled to work in the mines. The lack of skills makes it hard for them to enjoy the harsh world of mining.
Poor Miner
This person have failed to succeed or was fired from the mines for the lack of skills.
Bad Mine Manager
This person has the embarrassing honour of making a mine become bankrupt. This lack of skill is now effecting the other mines.
Engineer
This person have built war machines for others and is using that skills to improve the land.
Superior Engineer
This person have built complex war machines and have been quite skilled at the art of designing other machines.
Master Engineer
This person can be expected to design and build anything that others may baulk at. Flying machines or steel horses may is this engineer forte.
Inferior Engineer
This person have built some shoddy war machines for others and they tend to find themselves with foolish patrons.
Bad Engineer
This person have made dangerous war machines that was more deadly for the troops than the enemy.
Appalling Engineer
This person is a threat to everyone around them when they create anything. Chairs with legs point the wrong way or even a bed with a post in the middle of it have been seen.
Trader
This person used to be a trader before they worked at the state.
Superior Trader
This person used to be a trader and was able to get trade-goods and contracts better than others.
Master Trader
This person used to be a trader and was able to buy and sell anything of value, trade will flourish under this person.
Poor Trader
This person used to trade before loosing too many trade deals and cash.
Inferior Trader
This person doesn't understand the phrase Buy low, Sell high. Rather they would do the opposite.
Appalling Trader
This person is a danger to any coin owning trader, ships have found themselves with less cash than goods and entire trade companies have collapsed under their rule.

column1: #JUST (LEADS TO JUST AND ABSOLUTELY_JUST NEEDS JUST)

column2: Even Handed
This person is well known for the fair nature of the judgements this person hands out.
Absolutely Just
The law is the law and none shall be wronged under this person.
Judgemental
This person tends to find themselves handing out judgements without listening to the evidence.
Wrong Headed
This person is known for the lack of justice if the "wrong sort" of people are shown to them.
Unjust
The law is mine to use! Justice is a fool errand for this person.
Punisher
This person is well known for the surprising harshness of their judgements.
Severe Punisher
This person does not care for mercy and tend to kill others for seemly minor crimes.
Harsh Punisher
This person have been known for demanding executions of children or petty crimes.
Lenient
This person doesn't like to hand out punishments that seem too harsh. Executions are rare under their rule.
Merciful Judge
This person tends to avoid executions, rather they prefer blood money or banishments.
Kind Judge
This person is well known among the land for the lack of harsh punishments. Making this difficult for those who are wronged toa accept.
Heartless Ruler
This ruler is known for the callous nature of their perception of their subjects.
Harsh Ruler
This ruler is known for the harsh and almost tyrannical nature of their rule.
Cruel Ruler
This ruler enjoys the suffering of their subjects.
Sadistic Ruler
This ruler finds the suffering of people almost erotic and tends to think of ever increasing sadistic punishments or games.
Benevolent Ruler
This ruler is known for the rather soft touch towards their subjects.
Benign Ruler
This ruler is known for the kind and gentle nature of their rule.
Humane Ruler
This ruler never seems to hurt any of their subjects. Even the peasants have rights!
Superior Builder
This person is well known for the large constructions under their stead.
Excellent Builder
This person is well known for the high quality of the buildings under their stead.
Great Builder
This person is legendary for the constructions under their stead.
Indifferent Builder
This person is well known for the shoddy work done on buildings under their stead.
Inferior Builder
This person is quite well known for the often dangerous work done on buildings under their stead.
Appalling Builder
This person is infamous for the disastrous work done on buildings under their stead.
Positive
This person considers the current moment to be quite good.
Optimistic
This person considers the current moment to be improving.
Calm
This person doesn't see anything to be right or wrong right now.
Composed
This person seems to be content right now.
Gloomy
This person had a bad time recently and is feeling gloomy.
Morose
This person had something awful happen to them and now is morose about life.
Melancholic
This person is on the edge of despair thanks to a terrible event or loss recently.
Testy
This person is not happy about something right now and is willing to complain about something.
Cantankerous
This person is angry about something right now and will find things to let out steam.
Choleric
This person is extremely anger and will use this anger towards something and may attempt to kill someone.
Gladiatorial Fan
This person likes to see the Gladiators fights.
Gladiator Obsessed
This person spends a lot of time watching the Gladiators training.
Worships Gladiators
This person is spending all the day watching the fights and training and may even be thinking of becoming one!
No Taste for Bloodsports
This person feels that Bloodsports are barbaric.
Quietly Dislikes the Gladiator Fights
This person feels that Gladiator fights should be banned but is unwilling to let other know.
Publicly Despises the Gladiator Fights
This person have made their feeling towards the gladiator fights known, much to the shame of their compatriots.
Race Goer
This person like to watch the races time to time.
Loves Races
This person loves the races and may even be thinking of becoming a racer!
Racer
This person have taken part of a race.
Champion Racer
This person have won races so often that they have won championships.
Bored by Races
This person fails to see why watching things running around an oval is so exciting.
Reads during Races
This person likes to read during races, much to the disgust of other race goers.
Works during Races
This person is hated among other race goers for the blatant disregard of the race.
Open Handed
This person is known for sharing more than others.
Unstinting
This person is known for handing a considerable amount of gifts to others.
Careful with Money
This person is known for the rather frugal manner they have towards money.
Tight Fisted
This person is known for not giving gifts to others unless they get a profit.
Miserly
This person is known for the total lack of gifts. A single coin that slips of their grasp is quickly hunted down and reclaimed.
Scrooge
This person considers charity as a fool tax, woe to those who work under this person.

column1: #FOREIGN_TASTES (PEOPLE DON'T LIKE IT WHEN YOU START LIKING OTHER CULTURES)

column2: Interested in Foreign Cultures
This person is quite interested in the ways of other cultures.
Dresses Like a Foreigner
This person likes to dress up like a foreigner making others think that this person have gone "Native" on them.
Vulgar Foreign Tastes
This person can be seen trying to emulate foreign tastes right down to the very accent. This person have gone "Native".
Awful Foreign Affection
This person cannot call themselves their home culture any more, rather they are nothing more than the culture they so desire to be with.
True Roman
This person is considered a true Roman citizen compared to their backward cultures.
